channel.title: Run on berky client doesnt work
channel.description: this is what it says in the run.bat: @echo off Title Berky-Scape Client cd files java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1 pause and error is : 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue...

item.title: Run on berky client doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @i_0wn_y00 i 0wn y00
item.description:
@i_0wn_y00 wrote:

this is what it says in the run.bat:
@echo off
Title Berky-Scape Client
cd files
java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1
pause
and error is :
‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue…

Read full topic
item.source: Run on berky client doesnt work
